list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add detailed README.md to document project setup, structure, and usage

task.summary:
feat: implement user creation with unique constraints
- Added logic to ensure username, phone_number, and email are unique during user creation - creating `add_user` function to validate input data before insertion - Added FastAPI endpoints for: - Adding a new user (`POST /add-user`) - Retrieving all users (`GET /get-users`) - Integrated `lifespan` to manage database connection initialization

feat: integrate Kafka consumer and task status tracking
- Added Kafka consumer to process login requests and validate user credentials - Implemented task status storage in the database using the `TaskStatus` model - Integrated task processing with FastAPI lifecycle using `asyncio.create_task` but it has some problems - Added `/get-tasks` endpoint to retrieve all task statuses

Add bcrypt password hashing and verification, update user creation and login process
- Implemented password hashing with bcrypt - Updated `add_user` function to hash passwords before saving them to the database. - Added password verification logic in `consume_messages` when processing login requests.

feat: Add JWT authentication and authorization
- Integrated JWT for user authentication and token-based authorization. - Created utility functions for JWT generation (`create_jwt`) and verification (`verify`). - Secured endpoints (`get-tasks`, `get-by-id`, `current-user`) using FastAPI's dependency injection and JWT verification. - Added `/current-user` endpoint to retrieve current user details from the JWT payload. - Updated `/twitter-login` to return a JWT token upon successful login.
Add detailed README.md to document project setup, structure, and usage
